reviews: Easy to pick up and play, and everyone loved it! The team dynamic is very refreshing in boardgames and working together to beat the dungeon bosses is an absolute blast! This is a great game for a group of friends

The book was great - the characters were wonderful and Eames makes you feel like Saga was a group of friends you've known your entire life. The comradery, the sacrifices, and the incredible battles were gripping but the witty dialogue and humor were easily my favorite parts of the book. If you're looking for a great read that is just the right length, Kings of the Wyld is perfect for you.
The Mistborn series is incredible and the UK version art is great

This hair dryer is incredibly light and powerful. Dries my hair in 30 seconds (I have short straight hair) and the concentrator is a great attachment when I'm styling my hair with product. The matte finish is a great texture and the cord is so long you never have to worry about it getting unplugged. All in all, this is a great hair dryer and I definitely recommend if you're looking for a light, compact, and powerful tool that leaves your hair feeling nice and healthy!

I bought this curling iron for my girlfriend so she could curl her hair but unfortunately the Curls don't last due to their large size. It does make her hair wavy though and she seems to love it. I ended up getting a 1 inch hot tools curling iron and she absolutely loves that one. Nevertheless, this 1.25 inch curling iron heats up very fast and is built to last - if you're looking for nice wavy hair this is the tool for you

Great Case - really nice design with the vinyl backing and carbon grips. The phone has never slipped out of my hand when using it and it fits the Pixel 3 perfectly. I have dropped it a couple of times but there's not a single scratch, dent, or crack to show for it. For the price and quality it's a great purchase I would definitely recommend it!

One of the discs was warped so it didn't work well at all but the other was perfect. Put some felt pads on the metal surface and you can place it on any surface, this turned a Charcuterie board into a versatile Lazy Susan that can be used for almost every occasion. Also, the best part is that its very light and thin so you don't even notice it. The only reason I am giving it a 4 star rating instead of a 5, is because one of the discs was unusable other than that it was fantastic.

The product is not worth the money, it is garbage after a couple of showers. The body scrubber half is not rough at all, and the other side is practically useless as it doesn't retain any soap. A standard loofa will be just as useful, please do not waste your money on this product.

Keyboard is nice and light, doesn't have a great design and a little awkward to use with the round keys but still a good keyboard. I got it on sale for 29.99 and i feel that's a fair price for it. No complaints but nothing extraordinary which is why I'm giving it a 4/5.
Absolutely needed for 5ed. Great book, tons of info, great pictures, helps to immerse you in the world of DND. If you want to play, grab this book asap!

review_title: It has helped a good amount but keep in mind I have used other ...
reviews:
I purchased this clay to be used with ginger juice to help treat my vitiligo. It has helped a good amount but keep in mind I have used other supplements as well. For the price and amount this is a great deal for red clay.
Ratios for clay and ginger juice are 1:1 once a day.
Also used coconut oil on affected skin in the morning and night.
Used folic acid, ginkgo biloba, vitamin b12, vitamin d, and vitamin c.
Talk to a health care professional but I used these supplements to help treat my vitiligo. I generally followed the advised dosages for everything listed.

review_title: I bought this cookbook as a gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loved it, we've made a couple recipes already and ...
reviews: Tons of recipes to choose from and a ton of variety. I bought this cookbook as a gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loved it, we've made a couple recipes already and the food has been delicious. I would definitely recommend this cookbook to anyone looking to make fun foods for all occasions.

review_title: I can't recommend this product simply because I cannot trust its reliability ...
reviews: As soon as I opened the box I noticed the charging port of the keyboard was faulty. I tried to plug in the cable that came with the keyboard and it would not fit - I looked inside the port and saw an electronic chip stuck and blocking the hole for the cable. I bought this keyboard for its sleek design, spaced out keys, and small size; disregarding the fact that it was delivered damaged, it did meet these expectations. At the end of the day, unfortunately, I can't recommend this product simply because I cannot trust its reliability and structural integrity. If you're looking for a keyboard, I suggest you look elsewhere or maybe consider Arteck's led backlit keyboards for a similar price. Good luck.

Loving the case so far, the cognac leather colour is perfect and it feels great. Make sure to follow instructions when inserting your IPad into the case to ensure it is properly tucked in with all 4 corners hugging the iPad. I have the 2015 12.9 inch iPad Pro and it fits the case perfectly.
Exactly what I needed to start as a DM, and the price is great too
